Posts.Content: Concernedmomof2 wrote: Hello , I went for a mammo and sonogram today....Dr. told me I have microcalssifications and he doesn't think its cancer, but wants me to have an biopsy done. My family and friends and message boards say "its most likely 85 % negative for cancer.  I am very nervous about any pain from biopsy and the results.  Anyone ever been in my place and what was your outcome? Posts.Title: Not diagnosed yet.....but anxious and worried Concernedmomof2 GramM

Posts.Content: Concernedmomof2 wrote: Does the length of time mean anything on the outcome of results?  I am new to this,  I had a stat. biopsy on 1/31/13 (thurs).  Radiologist found tiny micro-cal. in left breast BI-Rad 4 (one area only). I am breaking down emotionally, especially when the phone rings :((( Log in to post a reply
